definition: to play with/to engage in/to resort to/to dally with
surname Shua
to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)
lane/alley
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with

sentences.english: Don't touch or play with precious things without the owner's permission.
sentences.chinese: 未經主人答應，勿要拿起耍弄別人的珍貴之物。

sentences.english: Don"t touch or play with precious things without the owner"s permission.
sentences.chinese: 未經主人允許，勿要拿起耍弄別人的貴重之物。

sentences.english: I wished he had never played his bastardly tricks.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直在耍弄種種卑鄙的伎倆。

sentences.english: Learn how to juggle two ball in this free beginner juggling tricks video.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在這個自由耍弄雜技技巧初學者兩個球視頻。

sentences.english: He's very charming and preys on rich widows.
sentences.chinese: 他長得很英俊，專靠耍弄有錢的寡婦。

sentences.english: But there’s also a tradition of large companies attempting to fool a lot of people.
sentences.chinese: 但是，也有大公司試圖耍弄一大羣人的傳統。
